name: Tokino Sora
oshiSkillName: リプレイスメント ("Replacement") Power - 1
oshiSkillDescription: [Once per turn] Swap one cheer card from your stage to one of your Holomen.
spOshiSkillName: じゃあ敵だね ("then you're an enemy") Power -2
spOshiSkillDescription: [Once per game] Switch your opponent's center Holomen with one of their back Holomen. Then, for the duration of this turn, your white center Holomen's arts increase by 50.
